attributes.action: Allow family gathering on 24th and 25th December.
attributes.additional_details:
For many people living in UK, predominantly Polish Christians, the 24th of December is by far more important day then 25th December. In most  Eastern European countries Christmas Eve is celebrated on 24 December. This is a day when we have family dinners to celebrate Jesus Christ's birth. 
Unfortunately the latest changes in so called Covid rules are against religious freedoms for thousands of people living in UK.
attributes.background: Adjust the latest restrictions related to Covid-19

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564244
